author: James Martin
method: Roll out the puff pastry into a large square and cook according to the instructions on the packet (approximately 7 minutes). Once cooked, leave the pastry to cool.  Mix the mascarpone and honey together and spread over the cooled pastry.  Decorate with blueberries and a light dusting of icing sugar.
ingredients: packet of shop bought puff pastry,  2 tubs of mascarpone ,  1 tub of clear honey,  fresh blueberries,  icing sugar to dust
